contentTypes.name: Home Page
contentTypes.description: Homepage content including hero section, philosophy cards, and featured work

fields.name: Page Title
fields.helpText: Internal reference for this homepage content

fields.name: Hero Main Title
fields.helpText: Main headline in the hero section (e.g., 'Hi, I'm Ash Shaw')

fields.name: Hero Subtitle
fields.helpText: Subtitle below main title (e.g., 'makeup artist')

fields.name: Hero Description
fields.helpText: Brief description under the hero title and subtitle

fields.name: Hero CTA Button Text
fields.helpText: Text for the main call-to-action button

fields.name: Hero Background Images
fields.helpText: Background images for the hero section mosaic (1-5 images)

fields.name: Philosophy Section Title
fields.helpText: Title for the 'Why I Do Makeup' section

fields.name: Philosophy Cards
fields.helpText: Cards explaining why you do makeup (up to 6 cards)

fields.name: Featured Work Section Title
fields.helpText: Title for the featured work section

fields.name: Featured Work Description
fields.helpText: Description for the featured work section

fields.name: SEO Page Title
fields.helpText: SEO optimized page title (max 60 characters)

fields.name: SEO Meta Description
fields.helpText: SEO meta description (max 160 characters)

contentTypes.name: Philosophy Card
contentTypes.description: Individual cards for the 'Why I Do Makeup' section

fields.name: Card Title
fields.helpText: Title for this philosophy card

fields.name: Card Description
fields.helpText: Description explaining this philosophy/reason

fields.name: Icon Name
fields.helpText: Icon identifier for this card (heart, palette, lightbulb, etc.)

fields.name: Gradient Theme
fields.helpText: Color gradient theme for this card

fields.name: Display Order
fields.helpText: Order for displaying cards (0 = first)

contentTypes.name: Portfolio Entry

fields.helpText: Brief description for cards and previews

fields.name: Category

fields.name: Featured Image
fields.helpText: Main image for cards and previews

fields.name: Gallery Images
fields.helpText: Additional images for the gallery (up to 15 images)

fields.name: Location
fields.helpText: Event location or shoot location

fields.name: Event Date
fields.helpText: Date when this work was created

fields.helpText: Should this appear in featured work sections?

fields.name: Display Order
fields.helpText: Order for displaying entries (0 = first)

fields.helpText: Client name or event name
